sections: There are many reasons the COVID-19 pandemic has caused more death and devastation in the United States than nearly anywhere else in the world. But an eye-opening new report from a national consumer watchdog group suggests a major factor was the country’s for-profit health care system, which created a perfect storm of conditions that led to maximum pandemic impact.
• A new paper from an epidemiologist warns CDC school reopening guidelines may not be enough.
• Zoom has made a killing during the pandemic, but does it pay its taxes?
• Dr. Fauci, America’s doctor, courts pharmaceutical lobbyists.
